page.title: 03Employment in Edlington
page.content: There are{three majar places for {employment}close to or within the Edlington area.These are{Bartols {Plastics, Danum Aluminum and the {Yorkshire Main Colliery.}However a survey in our school shows that only {3% of parents}are employed at{Danum {Aluminum and Bartols Plastics}whilst the{Colliery employs 21% of parents. {Unemployment accounts for 25% of {parents}and yet more jobs may be lost. Recent articles in the local newspaper indicate that there are discussions taking place on closing Edlington Colliery. Only a few fortunate people will have the chance for a job, what is there to hand to us children? What kind of life can we live on the dole in Edlington?
